content: moon jellyfish tired of making the same old jelly pattern this little squish is just as easy with a more sophisticated look made in the round with no sewing this moon jelly makes for a quick personal project or market make learning to change colors this is a great practice pattern materials any yarn i used loops & threads soft classic white pink accent color 4mm hook or appropriate size for your yarn stitch markers scissors jellyfish made with suggested yarn and hook size are ~2 inches across © zosha adam a purple house for personal use only do not copy alter or sell you may sell finished items giving credit to a purple house as the designer written instructions continue in a spiral for all rounds do not chain and turn round 0 white magic_ring round 1 8 single_crochet 8 round 2 8 increase 16 round 3 pink single_crochet white increase x 8 24 round 4 pink single_crochet white increase single_crochet x 8 32 round 5 white single_crochet pink 3 single_crochet white 5 single_crochet x 3 pink 3 single_crochet white 4 single_crochet 32 round 6 32 single_crochet 32 round 7 single_crochet increase 7 single_crochet increase x 3 6 single_crochet 36 round 8 3 single_crochet chain 5 4 slip_stitch down chain x 12 36 round 9 4 single_crochet decrease x 6 skipping chains 30 round 10 3 single_crochet decrease x 6 24 round 11 24 single_crochet 24 round 12 2 single_crochet decrease x 6 18 round 13 single_crochet decrease x 6 12 stuff lightly the bottom should be concave dish in not flat round 14 6 decrease 6 cut your yarn leaving a short 2in/5cm tail weave tail through front loops of remaining stitches and pull to close tuck tail into your finished moon jelly © zosha adam a purple house for personal use only do not copy alter or sell you may sell finished items giving credit to a purple house as the designer
